TextView.android:text: Seismic Droid is an open source application. It provides near real-time updates for earthquakes from around the world; while several parameters are still configurable. Seismic Droid has two components, a background service and a foreground app. While background service runs at a configurable schedule and maintains a list of earthquakes, foreground app can be started by user and details can be viewed on demand.
It's licensed under creative commons license.
